short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click screenshot tool that instantly captures and saves your current browser tab with automatic timestamp-based file naming.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a one-click solution for capturing screenshots of your current browser tab. It's designed for speed and simplicity, making it ideal for quickly saving web content.

Key Features:
- Instant Capture: Click the extension icon to instantly capture the visible area of your current tab.
- Automatic Saving: Screenshots are automatically saved with filenames that include a timestamp, ensuring you won't lose track of your captures.
- Privacy-Focused: This extension only captures what you see in your browser tab. No personal data or browsing history is collected or stored.
- Lightweight and Efficient: Minimal impact on your browser's performance.
- No Complicated Settings: Simple and intuitive - just click and capture!
